name: Long Live Santa!
description:
Compete in this brand new epic multiplayer PvP survival game from Doborog Games!

Originally conceived as a quick technical exercise in multiplayer game creation, Twitch chat's interest in the game's quirky action and interactive fun led the dev team to go, “let’s actually release this!”The Tale...
Santa is dead. Now the remaining bearded men of the Norwegian wilderness must fight to the death. Will you be the next Santa, or die in the snow? Punch, slice, outwit your way to a fulfilling new seasonal job.Gameplay
With fast and furious gameplay, finding out if you will wear the tattered cloak of Santa Claus has never been more intense. Weapons drop from the sky as you compete against strangers on the internet to be the last one standing.

  • Create or join a server to instantly start a match.
  • Choose between two unique game modes - Last Santa Standing, battle-royale-style last-man-standing combat where weapons are scarce but powerful, or Deathmatch, a continuous round with little downtime and instant re-spawns.
  • Once the round starts, all bets are off. Find your weapons, best your Santa foes, and perhaps you will be the Winner, Winner, Christmas Dinner!
Key Features
  • Online Multiplayer Combat with up to 8 players per battle.
  • Gift Boxes drop from the sky containing weapons!
  • Festive Weapons! Shoot your fellow Santa contenders with a Candy Crossbow, slice them with your Santa Sword, or just punch them with your bare-knuckle fists!
  • Last Santa Standing game mode: seek out weapons, attack enemies, or cower in the corner. Winner, winner, Christmas dinner.
